titles.title: PREEMIE Reauthorization Act of 2022
PREEMIE Reauthorization Act of 2022
A bill to reauthorize the Prematurity Research Expansion and Education for Mothers who deliver Infants Early Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
PREEMIE Reauthorization Act of 2022
This bill reauthorizes through FY2028 research, health care provider education, and other activities focused on preventing and treating preterm birth.
